wikipedia_page.main: Sophie Leigh Stone (born c. 1981)   is an English stage and television actress. She was the first deaf student to win a place at the drama school RADA.

link_mentions.page: List of alumni of the Royal Academy of Dramatic Art

response: Stone was married in 1980 to Ruth Bullock and their daughter is the actress Sophie Leigh Stone.

Ismail has an elder sister who is deaf, and is proficient in British Sign Language. In October 2015 he played the character of Lunn, interpreting for deaf crew-leader Cass (Sophie Leigh Stone) in the Doctor Who series 9 two-part story "Under the Lake" / "Before the Flood". He plays Ahsan in We Are Lady Parts.
* Sophie Leigh Stone as Princess Alice, Philip's mother
